title: Add PaneBackground Property to NavigationView
body: It is currently possible to change the background brush of the NavigationView itself, but the Pane, in particular, is not so straightforward. Users can modify the designated ResourceKey, but cannot change this brush outside of XAML.

comments.body: @Luke Blevins - NavigationView and other Xaml controls have been open sourced, and the best place to propose changes to controls is on our https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml repo. Would you mind creating a new feature request using the template on GitHub, https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml/issues/new/choose
Thank you for your feedback. We've added a PaneBackground property to our feature backlog.
